label: 国幣社
本: The Adoption of the Ritsuryo Codes and Their Civilizing Influence. ACTA ASIATICA, 99 . The Tōhō Gakkai . 2010-08
説明文: Provincial shrines, established from the ninth century onwards, where offerings were presented by officials attached to the office of the provincial governor rather than by the Office of Deities.
